description:
Like I’ve been saying for a while now to anyone who’ll listen: the corporate pharma-controlled media does not legally have to give us TRUTH. 

This bill proves that, without a shadow of a doubt. Obama essentially legalized propaganda that pharma is using to their advantage now. 

It doesn’t behoove their industry, their shareholders or their bottom line to give us truth about “health”, or anything else for that matter. 

Listed as “Entertainment” in their NAICS codes as well.

•

@the controversial_mama:

I’m sure if you have followed my page for a while you’ve probably seen me post about the Stasi State and massive police state we have entered into over the last 20 years here in America.

In 2013, Obama signed into “Law” the Smith-Mundt Modernization Act which nullified the original 1948 SMA which protected the public from government controlled propaganda.

Since then, we’ve had the government and media waging a war on our minds through Mass Information Operations using propaganda to influence the American public.

As we can see now in 2020, we have a plethora of fake news and misinformation that has greatly effected the minds of the masses.

Peep my stories for articles and more details pertaining to the SMA.
